resources.name: stats-total
resources.title: Totals
resources.description: Retrieves a list of global Unsplash statistics including total photos, views, downloads, likes, and more. Reflects aggregate platform metrics.

resources.name: stats-month
resources.title: Monthly stats
resources.description: Retrieves overall Unsplash statistics for the past 30 days, including views, downloads, and engagement metrics.

resources.name: list-topics
resources.title: List topics
resources.description: Retrieves a single page from the list of all topics. Supports filtering, pagination, and sorting.
